step.datasource: select distinct TOP 100 PERCENT k.ordernr as headerid, k.ordernr from orkrg k with (nolock) inner join orsrg r with (nolock) on r.ordernr = k.ordernr where k.ord_soort = 'V' AND k.afgehandld = 0 and r.pakbon_afg = 0 and r.artcode = 'TXT-HAND' order by ordernr

select TOP 100 PERCENT k.ordernr as headerid, k.ordernr, r.ID, 'TXT-PROJECT' AS artcode from orkrg k with (nolock) inner join orsrg r with (nolock) on r.ordernr = k.ordernr where k.ord_soort = 'V' AND k.afgehandld = 0 and r.pakbon_afg = 0 and r.artcode = 'TXT-HAND' order by ordernr

select DISTINCT TOP 100 PERCENT r.OrderNr as headerid, r.OrderNr from [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_EG_Import_SODeliveryDate] i inner join [400]..[orkrg] k with (NOLOCK) on i.OrderNr = k.ordernr and i.DebtorNr collate database_default = k.debnr inner join [400]..[orsrg] r with (NOLOCK) on i.OrderNr = r.ordernr and i.RowNr = r.regel and i.itemcode collate database_default = r.artcode where NewDeliveryDate <> EGPlannedDate and message = 'Order contains set items, change manual' and state = 2 and i.Syscreated < '2021-04-09' ORDER BY r.ordernr

select TOP 100 PERCENT r.OrderNr as HeaderId, r.OrderNr, r.ID, i.RowNr as regel, i.EGPlannedDate AS afldat from [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_EG_Import_SODeliveryDate] i inner join [400]..[orkrg] k with (NOLOCK) on i.OrderNr = k.ordernr and i.DebtorNr collate database_default = k.debnr inner join [400]..[orsrg] r with (NOLOCK) on i.OrderNr = r.ordernr and i.RowNr = r.regel and i.itemcode collate database_default = r.artcode where NewDeliveryDate <> EGPlannedDate and message = 'Order contains set items, change manual' and state = 2 and i.Syscreated < '2021-04-09' ORDER BY r.Ordernr

SELECT ordernr as headerid, ordernr, id, regel, artcode, prijslijst as Prijslijst_old, 'VCE NA' as Prijslijst, prijs83 as old_prijs83, prijs_n as old_prijs_n, (SELECT top 1 (CASE WHEN staffl.kort_pbn = 'M' THEN ((items.CostPriceStandard * ISNULL(staffl.unitfactor, 1)) * ( 1 + staffl.bedr1/100)) ELSE staffl.prijs83 END) FROM staffl JOIN items ON items.ItemCode = staffl.artcode WHERE staffl.prijslijst = 'VCE NA' AND items.condition = 'A' AND '2023-07-17' >= staffl.validfrom AND '2023-07-17' < staffl.validto AND items.ItemCode = r.artcode) as prijs83, (SELECT top 1 (CASE WHEN staffl.kort_pbn = 'M' THEN ((items.CostPriceStandard * ISNULL(staffl.unitfactor, 1)) * ( 1 + staffl.bedr1/100)) ELSE staffl.prijs83 END) FROM staffl JOIN items ON items.ItemCode = staffl.artcode WHERE staffl.prijslijst = 'VCE NA' AND items.condition = 'A' AND '2023-07-17' >= staffl.validfrom AND '2023-07-17' < staffl.validto AND items.ItemCode = r.artcode) as prijs_n FROM orsrg r WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND r.ordernr IN ( '62300315', '62300409', '62300548', '62300549', '62300557', '62300780', '62300786', '62301050', '62301062', '62301070', '62301161', '62301163', '62301164', '62301165', '62301166', '62301167', '62301168', '62301171', '62301173', '62301174', '62301178', '62301179', '62301180', '62301181', '62301183', '62301184', '62301186', '62301192', '62301504', '62301546', '62301547', '62301548', '62301549', '62301774', '62301779', '62301780', '62301781', '62301782', '62301839', '62301945', '62301946', '62301947', '62301948', '62301949', '62301950', '62301951', '62301954', '62301955', '62301956', '62301957', '62301958', '62301959', '62301960', '62301961', '62302276', '62302277', '62302278', '62302279', '62302280', '62302281', '62302282', '62302283', '62302284', '62302285', '62302479', '62302480' ) AND (ar_soort <> 'P') AND artcode NOT LIKE '%TXT%' AND prijs_n > .1 AND r.uitgifte = 0 AND r.afldat > '2023-07-17' AND prijslijst = 'VCE NA' AND prijs83 <> (SELECT top 1 (CASE WHEN staffl.kort_pbn = 'M' THEN ((items.CostPriceStandard * ISNULL(staffl.unitfactor, 1)) * ( 1 + staffl.bedr1/100)) ELSE staffl.prijs83 END) FROM staffl JOIN items ON items.ItemCode = staffl.artcode WHERE staffl.prijslijst = 'VCE NA' AND items.condition = 'A' AND '2023-07-17' >= staffl.validfrom AND '2023-07-17' < staffl.validto AND items.ItemCode = r.artcode)

select k.ordernr as HeaderId, k.ordernr, k.afldat as orderdate, MIN (r.afldat) as afldat from [100]..orkrg k with (NOLOCK) inner join [100]..orsrg r with (NOLOCK) on k.ordernr = r.ordernr where k.ordernr = 12100102 and k.ord_soort = 'V' AND k.afgehandld = 0 and r.pakbon_afg = 0 and r.ar_soort IN ('T', 'V') group by k.ordernr, k.afldat having MIN (r.afldat) <> k.afldat

WITH deldates AS( select k.ordernr, k.afldat as orderdate, MIN (r.afldat) as afldat from [100]..orkrg k with (NOLOCK) inner join [100]..orsrg r with (NOLOCK) on k.ordernr = r.ordernr where k.ordernr = 12100102 and k.ord_soort = 'V' AND k.afgehandld = 0 and r.pakbon_afg = 0 and r.ar_soort IN ('T', 'V') group by k.ordernr, k.afldat having MIN (r.afldat) <> k.afldat )
SELECT r.id, r.ordernr as HeaderID, r.ordernr, r.regel FROM [100]..orsrg r with (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN deldates d on d.ordernr = r.ordernr

select TOP 100 PERCENT ordernr as headerid, ordernr, debnr, CASE WHEN refer1 IS NOT NULL AND refer2 IS NOT NULL THEN refer1 + ' | ' + refer2 ELSE ISNULL(refer1,'') + ISNULL(refer2,'') END AS refer from orkrg with (NOLOCK) where afgehandld = 0 and debnr in ('040447','040448', '974605') and refer is null and (refer1 IS NOT NULL OR refer2 IS NOT NULL) order by ordernr

select TOP 100 PERCENT o.ordernr as headerid, o.ordernr, MIN(r.id) as id from orkrg o with (NOLOCK) inner join orsrg r with (NOLOCK) on o.ordernr = r.ordernr where o.afgehandld = 0 and o.debnr in ('040447','040448', '974605') and o.refer is null and (o.refer1 IS NOT NULL OR o.refer2 IS NOT NULL) group by o.ordernr order by o.ordernr

SELECT DISTINCT top 10 b.document as Document, (b.filename) as New_filename
FROM [ABSC_Data].._AB_tb_VanReenen_WarehouseShipment t INNER JOIN [400]..BacoDiscussions b ON B.OrderNumber = t.order_reference COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT AND B.TYPE = 12 Where 1 = 1 --AND t.runid = '%runid%' AND t.rowstatus = 1
step.contentbody:
Hi, hierbij een voorbeeld


%runid%

step.datasource:
SELECT DISTINCT b.document as Document, (b.filename) as New_filename
FROM [ABSC_Data].._AB_tb_VanReenen_WarehouseShipment t INNER JOIN [400]..BacoDiscussions b ON B.OrderNumber = t.order_reference COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT AND B.TYPE = 12 Where 1 = 1 AND t.runid = '%runid%'
step.contentbody:
We are pleased to inform you that the attached orders have been processed at Orlaco.

For your convenience, we have included the packing list and corresponding PDFs. Please ensure that the delivery notes are incorporated into the paperwork for the weekly shipment.

If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to reach out to us at Order.Netherlands@Stoneridge.com.


Thank you,

Stoneridge | ORLACO – Vision is our mission®

step.datasource:
SELECT TOP 100 PERCENT ed.created AS LogDate , c.cmp_name AS Relatie , CASE WHEN c.cmp_type = 'C' THEN 'Debtor' ELSE 'Creditor' END AS Customer_Type , CASE WHEN c.cmp_type = 'C' THEN RTRIM(LTRIM(c.debcode)) ELSE RTRIM(LTRIM(c.crdcode)) END AS Number , ec.ComponentName AS Entity , ep.PropName AS Field , ed.oldvalue AS OldValue , ed.newvalue AS NewValue , h.fullname AS FullName FROM ebcdatalog ed WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN ebcprops ep WITH (NOLOCK) ON ed.property = ep.propid LEFT OUTER JOIN EbcComponents ec WITH (NOLOCK) ON ed.Component = ec.CompId LEFT OUTER JOIN humres h WITH (NOLOCK) ON ed.creator = h.res_id LEFT OUTER JOIN cicmpy c WITH (NOLOCK) ON ed.DataKey = c.cmp_wwn WHERE 1=1 AND (c.debcode IS NOT NULL OR c.crdcode IS NOT NULL) AND ec.CompId = 'DF2C80E9-0A2C-11D4-9DDF-0004AC25BEFA' -- Associates AND ep.PropId IN ( -- '10C509D3-0C5B-4430-BBA5-951092208900' -- cnt_FirstName - Voornaam -- '7B674000-4848-4B53-94EE-93F3C87BA7B1' -- cnt_Initials - Voorletters --, 'FAED2986-2EC7-4986-B07E-F37DE1028CE6' -- cnt_MiddleName - Tussenvoegsel --, '7B78A7A7-2291-4C76-B609-C89E7EF714C3' -- cnt_LastName - Achternaam '89F55AC6-6960-4A61-B51C-50492732BEDB' -- VatCode - BTW-Code , '7127B87C-A1CF-4B83-B34B-7FDB414A4590' -- VatNumber - BTW-Nummer , 'EE062E39-0723-471C-B46A-AE450A90695D' -- BankAccount - Bankrekening , 'D9F6A9B3-38D0-4BF2-8382-996AE7B9159E' -- CentralizationAccount - Crediteurenrekening , '22A5FC09-18E8-454E-97DE-B57282DB1E40' -- OffSetAccount - Tegenrekening , 'DF2C80FE-0A2C-11D4-9DDF-0004AC25BEFA' -- CustomerStatus - Status , '664C1176-F7A1-4E68-9172-7C9757F80C93' -- PosCountry - Country of the postal address , 'D9FD6371-F0F5-48B8-93AD-38A7F4913227' -- VisCountry - Country of the visit address , '3D559504-957D-4180-8E89-EE3A48E41522' -- PaymentCondition - Betalingsconditie , '6F433F4A-7C8E-4C32-BF08-F54E32D257C8' -- Creditline - Kredietlimiet , '2D5166CE-039A-4AEE-9B5A-652FC99AA642' -- PriceList , 'DF2C80F1-0A2C-11D4-9DDF-0004AC25BEFA' -- MailAddress , 'DF2C80F2-0A2C-11D4-9DDF-0004AC25BEFA' -- MailAddress2 , '8EFD7A01-E615-4A9C-A553-1B420C2D4DC6' -- MailAddress3 , 'D1EC3D8E-FC1F-47EA-BBBA-A3EC29404318' -- MailCity , '09B03CFE-D48D-46D7-923C-DC7D03DD8CA2' -- MailCounty , 'DF2C80F5-0A2C-11D4-9DDF-0004AC25BEFA' -- MailPostcode , 'DF2C8123-0A2C-11D4-9DDF-0004AC25BEFA' -- MailState , '7772D6D3-685D-4C5A-AF92-E87352EA7F1D' -- DelAddress , '76759C2B-807A-407D-8782-4824D2726A91' -- DelAddress2 , '3ABCCA7E-2ED6-4ED8-AFE6-AED231E635FC' -- DelAddress3 , '79A12735-E745-422F-B59A-B0A50FCC5B2A' -- DelCity , '4D18F830-7513-4E33-9E6D-8272FD33EA3A' -- DelCounty , '2E9E5391-F65A-494B-8545-5B7C09E4CE98' -- DelPostCode , '7C5B4A38-2701-45FD-9D64-BDF7CE96B0A2' -- DelState , '345E334F-2E81-41E1-9E9E-0086895B0634' -- InvAddress , '025CE17E-CFA4-4C00-B925-5817144450ED' -- InvAddress2 , '87DF35E8-2765-4E7D-B348-3FD0C524C099' -- InvAddress3 , '0D99F37C-47E4-40D4-BFA5-CBAE682475B2' -- InvCity , '61592D99-46A9-4289-9671-D810252F5A2C' -- InvCounty , '07A61FF4-7FC3-40E8-A3F4-63E445E58CB0' -- InvPostCode , 'D32A44C7-FEB7-4BFC-828E-8CEFDE8A7E4D' -- InvState , '6A287D4A-13FF-4FF8-B7A3-D809BDF7472F' --IncoTermCode , '3BB63337-A0C2-4792-8633-89407FC6838C' -- IncoTermProperty
) AND ed.Created BETWEEN DATEADD(DAY, -1, getdate()) AND getdate()
UNION ALL (
SELECT TOP 100 PERCENT ed.created AS LogDate , c.cmp_name AS Relatie , CASE WHEN c.cmp_type = 'C' THEN 'Debtor' ELSE 'Creditor' END AS Customer_Type , CASE WHEN c.cmp_type = 'C' THEN RTRIM(LTRIM(c.debcode)) ELSE RTRIM(LTRIM(c.crdcode)) END , ec.ComponentName AS Entity , ep.PropName AS Field , ed.oldvalue AS OldValue , ed.newvalue AS NewValue , h.fullname AS FullName FROM ebcdatalog ed WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN ebcprops ep WITH (NOLOCK) ON ed.property = ep.propid LEFT OUTER JOIN EbcComponents ec WITH (NOLOCK) ON ed.Component = ec.CompId LEFT OUTER JOIN humres h WITH (NOLOCK) ON ed.creator = h.res_id CROSS APPLY ( SELECT c.cmp_name, c.debcode, c.crdcode, c.cmp_type FROM bnkacc as ba WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN bnkkop as bk WITH (NOLOCK) ON bk.bank_rek = ba.banknr LEFT OUTER JOIN cicmpy as c WITH (NOLOCK) ON ( ( c.debnr = bk.debnr AND c.debnr IS NOT NULL AND bk.debnr IS NOT NULL ) OR ( c.crdnr = bk.crdnr AND c.crdnr IS NOT NULL AND bk.crdnr IS NOT NULL ) ) WHERE ba.id = ed.datakey ) AS c WHERE ec.CompId = '46948FFE-98C5-4BF7-9B9F-3D008E8F268B' -- CRMBankAccount AND ep.PropId IN ( 'DBA372AB-AE9A-4C00-9E3E-2C4F111AAB4E' -- AccountNumberBank - Rekeningnummer bank , '17099E47-ED85-4825-BDC3-62C5C78A1351' -- BankAccountCode - Bankcode , 'B60ADD34-4EAD-4CCE-A000-0F23CE89FBF5' -- BICCode - BIC-Code , '2E125751-97A0-472C-A6AB-8BE5949DFB6A' -- BranchCode - Filiaalcode , '4D3B47E9-B8AB-40AD-84C2-316878287E2C' -- ClearanceIdentification - Clearing identificatie , '4984B4BF-0208-493D-83A4-F695EAA064FE' -- Currency - Valuta , '0D927DA1-B86F-41B6-A18B-D9302C20246D' -- SwiftAddress - SWIFT-adres , '1DEB49CB-EF77-4124-B404-EEE37B7F50AC' -- BankAccountAndMask - Nummer , 'FB3AF41A-ABED-48E7-871B-786CD7DDBED2' -- BankAccountNumber - Bankrekening (niet in scherm) , '49CB39C3-5B29-4474-A9E2-963D415552DD' -- BankName - Banknaam , 'F86A9A0F-B520-4A33-8B7F-3446BE33ED43' -- IBAN - IBAN Nummer ) AND ed.Created BETWEEN DATEADD(DAY,-1, getdate()) AND getdate() ) ORDER BY c.cmp_name, ed.created, ep.PropName
step.contentbody:
Account changes %abeitoday%

LogDateRelatieCustomer_TypeNumberEntityFieldOldValueNewValueFullName
%LogDate%%Relatie%%Customer_Type%%Number%%Entity%%Field%%OldValue%%NewValue%%FullName%

step.datasource: select top 10 rh.id as headerid, rh.ID, rh.itemprod, convert(varchar,quantity) as drawingno from [100]..recipe rh with (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [100]..items i with (NOLOCK) ON i.itemcode = rh.itemprod where i.Condition = 'A' and rh.itemreq is null and rh.sequenceno = 0 and isnull(rh.drawingno,'') <> convert(varchar,rh.quantity) order by rh.itemprod

with reciperows as (SELECT MIN(sr.ID) AS Id, itemprod FROM [100]..recipe sr with (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [100]..items si with (NOLOCK) ON si.itemcode = sr.itemprod WHERE si.Condition = 'A' and sr.sequenceno > 0 and sr.itemreq is not null GROUP BY sr.itemprod)
select top 10 rh.id as headerid, r.ID, r.itemprod, r.sequenceno, r.itemreq from reciperows rr inner join [100]..recipe r with (NOLOCK) on r.ID = rr.ID inner join [100]..recipe rh with (NOLOCK) ON r.itemprod = rh.itemprod and rh.itemreq is null and rh.sequenceno = 0 INNER JOIN [100]..items i with (NOLOCK) ON I.itemcode = r.itemprod where i.Condition = 'A' and r.sequenceno > 0 and r.itemreq is not null and isnull(rh.drawingno,'') <> convert(varchar,rh.quantity) order by rh.itemprod, r.sequenceno
select TOP 1 * from [ExactData].dbo._ST_UPS_POD where UPSChecked = 1 and UPSStatus != 'Error' order by EOrderNumber

SELECT er.newkeyvalue as Ordernumber, at.AttachmentFileName as BinaryFileName, at.Attachment as BinaryDocument, at.AttachmentFileName as subject, 221 as type, 1 as status from [abei].dbo._AB_Entity_results as er with (nolock) inner join [400].dbo.orkrg as ok with (nolock) on er.newkeyvalue collate Latin1_General_CI_AS = ok.ordernr inner join dbo.absences as ab with (nolock) on ab.hid = er.headerid collate Latin1_General_CI_AS inner join dbo.Attachments at on ab.ID = at.Entity where 1=1 and er.jobid = '%jobid%' and er.runid = '%runid%' and er.entity = 'SalesOrderHeader' and er.rowstatus = 2 AND (ab.Type = 600) AND (ab.FreeBoolField_01 = 1) AND (ab.FreeBoolField_05 = 0)

select EBC_messageID, SupplierNumber, InvoiceNumberSupplier, GlobeEntryNumber, CurrentStatus, ExactError, InvoiceReveived, MessageTranformed, GlobeCreated, MessageStatus, MessageError from [EBC].[EDI].[PurchaseInvoiceLog] WHERE InvoiceReveived > DATEADD(DAY,-1,CONVERT(DATE,GETDATE()))
step.contentbody:
Dear colleques,

The following invoices are yesterday received and booked in Globe.






InvoiceNumberSupplierGlobeEntryNumberCurrentStatusExactError
%InvoiceNumberSupplier%%GlobeEntryNumber%%CurrentStatus%%ExactError%

step.datasource: select o.ordernr as HeaderID,o.ID, o.ordernr, 1 as afgehandld, a.FreeTextfield_03 AS DeletionReason from [orlaco]..absences a INNER JOIN [100]..orkrg o with (NOLOCK) on a.FreeIntField_01 = o.ordernr where a.Type = 213 and a.syscreator = 999999 and a.Status in(2, 4) and a.FreeGUIDField_06 IS NOT NULL and o.ord_soort = 'Q' and o.sysmodified < DATEADD(MONTH,-3,GETDATE()) and o.afgehandld = 0 and FreeTextField_03 like '1%' and o.ordernr = 11708200
select ordernr as headerid, ordernr, 997310 as debnr from [400]..orkrg with (nolock) where ordernr = 12113695
select top 1 ordernr as headerid, id, ordernr, regel from [400]..orsrg with (NOLOCK) where ordernr = 12113695
SELECT ID, HID, Type, 1 as Status from [orlaco]..absences with (NOLOCK) where type = 6035 and status = 0

SELECT i.itemcode AS artcode, '30' as magcode FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Items i with (NOLOCK) WHERE i.itemcode in ( select distinct r.artcode from [400]..orhkrg k with (NOLOCK) inner join [400]..orhsrg r with (NOLOCK) on k.ordernr = r.ordernr where k.debnr = 974605 and r.ar_soort = 'V' ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT magcode FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.voorrd WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE magcode = '30' AND artcode = i.itemcode)
SELECT cmp_code, cmp_wwn,1 as yesnofield4 , 1 as yesnofield5 from [orlaco]..cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) where LTRIM(RTRIM(textfield5)) in ( 'X7123Z0' ,'D3539K0' ) and (yesnofield4 = 0 OR yesnofield5 = 0)

select r.HID, r.Type, CASE WHEN r.empid = 0 then r.syscreator else r.empid end as empid, r.StartDate, r.Enddate, r.CustomerId, r.Description, CONCAT(r.RequestComments collate database_default , '
[', system_user, ' ', CONVERT(varchar,GETDATE(),120), '] Request restored from accidentialy deletion. Org created: ', CONVERT(varchar,r.syscreated,120), ' by ', r.syscreator, ' - ', ISNULL(hc.Fullname collate database_default,'') , ' Last modified: ', CONVERT(varchar,r.sysmodified,120), ' by ', r.sysmodifier, ' - ', ISNULL(hm.Fullname collate database_default,''), ' Org status: ', r.statusdescription collate database_default, ' on ', CONVERT(varchar,r.StatusChanged,120) , ' ', case when status = 1 or status = 4 then CONCAT( ' Approved on: ', CONVERT(varchar,Approved,120) , ' by ', Approver , ' - ', ISNULL(ha.Fullname collate database_default,''), ' ') END, case when status = 4 then CONCAT( ' Realized on: ', CONVERT(varchar,Realized,120), ' by ', Realizer, ' - ', ISNULL(hr.Fullname collate database_default,''), ' ') END, case when status = 2 then CONCAT( ' Rejected on: ', CONVERT(varchar,Rejected,120), ' by ', RejectedBy, ' - ', ISNULL(hd.Fullname collate database_default,''), ' ') END ) as RequestComments, WorkflowComments, RelatedRequestID,ParentRequest, FreeTextField_01, FreeTextField_02, FreeTextField_03, FreeTextField_04, FreeTextField_05, FreeBoolField_01 from [ExactData].dbo._ST_Restore_ITRequests r left join [orlaco]..humres hc (nolock) on hc.res_id = r.syscreator left join [orlaco]..humres hm (nolock) on hm.res_id = r.sysmodifier left join [orlaco]..humres ha (nolock) on ha.res_id = r.Approver left join [orlaco]..humres hr (nolock) on hr.res_id = r.Realizer left join [orlaco]..humres hd (nolock) on hd.res_id = r.RejectedBy WHERE HID NOT IN (SELECT HID from [orlaco]..absences a2 with (NOLOCK))
select newid as id, hid, syscreator from [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_Restore_ITRequests]

select r.newid as DocumentId,EntityType,Attachment AS BinaryAttachment,AttachmentFileName AS BinaryFileName,AttachmentFileExtension,AttachmentSize,AttachmentType , 400 as Division FROM [ExactData].dbo.[_ST_Restore_ITRequestAttachments] a Inner join [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_Restore_ITRequests] r on a.entity = r.id where r.hid != 4722033
SELECT i1.itemcode, i4.isassembled from [100]..items i1 with (NOLOCK) inner join [400]..items i4 with (NOLOCK) on i1.itemcode = i4.itemcode where i1.isassembled <> i4.isassembled

--select ID, 'Het Schakelplein 28' as addressline1, 0 as keepsameasvisit from addresses --where account = 'fd15ab15-ddee-4d8d-b7b4-628ee4e0af96' --and type <> 'VIS' and keepsameasvisit = 1 and id = 'cfad2b24-1a33-44fc-b86f-91569100ffad'
--select * from addresses --where account = 'fd15ab15-ddee-4d8d-b7b4-628ee4e0af96' --and type = 'VIS'
--11193 fd15ab15-ddee-4d8d-b7b4-628ee4e0af96 De Burgh Acht B.V. --select * from cicmpy with (NOLOCK) where cmp_type = 'C' and cmp_status = 'A'
SELECT TOP 100 ag.ID, cg.cmp_wwn as Account, ctg.cnt_id as ContactPerson, ag.ID AS AddressID ,a.[Type] ,a.[AddressLine1] --,ag.[AddressLine1] ,a.[AddressLine2] ,a.[AddressLine3] ,a.[PostCode] ,a.[City] ,a.[StateCode] ,a.[County] ,a.[Country] ,a.[Phone] ,a.[Fax] ,a.[Notes] ,a.[KeepSameAsVisit] ,CONVERT(int, a.[IsTaxable]) AS IsTaxable ,CONVERT(bit, a.[Main]) AS Main FROM dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_Addresses a WITH (NOLOCK) -- Globe INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy cg WITH (NOLOCK) ON cg.cmp_code = a.ESE_cmp_code INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicntp ctg WITH (NOLOCK) ON ctg.cmp_wwn = cg.cmp_wwn AND ctg.TextField5 = a.ESE_cnt_id INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Addresses ag WITH (NOLOCK) ON ag.Account = cg.cmp_wwn AND ag.ContactPerson = ctg.cnt_id AND ag.Type = a.Type WHERE 1=1 AND cg.cmp_type = 'C' -- Debtors only, it is possible we are accidentally joining a creditor with cmp_code so use this as filter AND cg.cmp_status = 'A' -- Active only
--AND (a.ESE_sysmodified > ag.sysmodified -- modified --OR (ag.syscreated = ag.sysmodified ) ) --) --and ag.[AddressLine1] != a.[AddressLine1] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT -- new, maybe we have to update the adresses too -- ag.ID = '538c2fc6-d340-4567-a263-28cb7b6c3812' ORDER BY account, ag.ID

select distinct k.ordernr as headerid ,k.[ordernr] ,k.[debnr] ,k.[fakdebnr] ,k.[verzdebnr] ,k.[naldebnr] ,k.[einddebnr] ,k.[refer] ,k.[refer1] ,k.[refer2] ,k.[refer3] ,k.[orddat] ,k.[afldat] ,k.[afl_week] ,k.[ordbv_afdr] ,k.[magcode] ,k.[selcode] ,k.[ex_artcode] ,k.[kstplcode] ,k.[fiattering] ,k.[ordbv_afgd] ,k.[btw_code] ,k.[btw_cd_ord] ,k.[valcode] ,k.[betcond] ,k.[levwijze] ,k.[stat_code] ,k.[pakbon_afg] ,k.[paklst_afg] ,k.[vrachtkost] ,k.[orderkost] ,k.[order_kort] ,k.[colli] ,k.[bruto_gew] ,k.[netto_gew] ,k.[fakt_code] ,k.[docnumber] ,k.[paymentmethod] ,k.[Approver] ,k.[Approved] ,k.[invoice_method] ,k.[IncoTermConfirmPrices] ,k.[IncoTermAcknowledgeOrder] ,k.[IncoTermCode] ,k.[IncoTermProperty] ,k.[ConfirmedBy] ,k.[Confirmed] ,k.[DueDate]
from [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.orkrg k with (NOLOCK) inner join [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.orsrg r with (NOLOCK) on r.ordernr = k.ordernr where k.debnr = '974605' -- DAF ME2 and k.afgehandld = 0 and r.pakbon_afg = 0 and k.ordernr not in (select kx.ordernr from [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.orkrg kx with (NOLOCK))

select k.ordernr as headerid ,r.[ordernr] ,r.[regel] ,r.[afldat] ,r.[artcode] ,r.[ar_soort] ,r.[oms45] ,r.[oms45_f] ,r.[magcode] ,r.[afl_week] ,r.[uitgifte] ,r.[aant_back] ,r.[esr_aantal] ,r.[aant_gelev] ,r.[aant_fakt] ,r.[reeds_fakt] ,r.[pakbon_afg] ,r.[btw_code] ,r.[prijslijst] ,r.[korting] ,r.[prijs83] ,r.[prijs_n] ,r.[lengte] ,r.[breedte] ,r.[hoogte] ,r.[dimensie] ,r.[kstplcode] ,r.[serie_num] ,r.[aantal_ser] ,r.[unit] ,r.[koers] ,r.[instruction] ,r.[unitcode] ,r.[unitfactor] ,r.[PlannedDate] ,r.[Requesteddate] ,r.[Originalplanneddate] ,r.[reasoncode] from [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.orkrg k with (NOLOCK) inner join [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.orsrg r with (NOLOCK) on r.ordernr = k.ordernr where k.debnr = '974605' -- DAF ME2 and k.afgehandld = 0 and r.pakbon_afg = 0 and r.ar_soort <> 'T' and k.ordernr not in (select kx.ordernr from [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.orkrg kx with (NOLOCK))
select top 10 c.cmp_wwn, c.cmp_code, c.PaymentCondition, '2' as DefaultSelCode from cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) where c.PaymentCondition = '22' and ISNULL(DefaultSelCode,'') != '2' order by c.cmp_code
select distinct a.ordernr as headerID, a.ordernr from ExactData.dbo._Update_Liebherr_20220330 A where ord_soort = 'Q' and afldat >= '2022-04-01'
select a.ordernr as HeaderID, a.id, 0 as korting, a.bedr1 as prijs83, a.bedr1 as prijs_n from ExactData.dbo._Update_Liebherr_20220330 A where ord_soort = 'Q' and afldat >= '2022-04-01'
select distinct a.ordernr as headerID, a.ordernr from ExactData.dbo._Update_WIRTGEN_20220330 A
select a.ordernr as HeaderID, a.id, a.bedr1 as prijs83, a.bedr1 as prijs_n from ExactData.dbo._Update_WIRTGEN_20220330 A
select distinct a.ordernr as headerID, a.ordernr from ExactData.dbo._Update_SCANIA_010_20220330 A where ord_soort = 'V'
select a.ordernr as HeaderID, a.id, a.bedr1 as prijs83, a.bedr1 as prijs_n from ExactData.dbo._Update_SCANIA_010_20220330 A where ord_soort = 'V'

select c2.cmp_wwn, c2.cmp_code, c.PriceList as Pricelist --,c2.cmp_name, c2.pricelist as pricelist_483, c.pricelist as pricelist_400 from [400]..cicmpy c with (NOLOCK) left join [483]..cicmpy c2 with (NOLOCK) on c2.cmp_code = c.cmp_code where c2.cmp_status = 'A' and ISNULL(c2.PriceList,'') <> ISNULL(c.pricelist,'') and c2.cmp_code = ' 999149'

select '%runid%' as HeaderID ,'G' as TransSubType ,'B' as Regelcode ,'100' as TransType ,Getdate() As 'Datum' ,reknr ,'Invalid stock' As oms25 ,'600' As kstplcode ,artcode ,facode ,'1' As warehouse , aantal , bdr_hfl ,GETDATE() As 'docdate' from [400]..gbkmut g with (nolock) inner Join [400]..items I with (nolock) on i.itemcode = g.artcode where artcode = '0103641' and oms25 like '%PROD00202614.002%' and reknr = ' 3300' and aantal = -19

select '%runid%' as HeaderID ,'G' as TransSubType ,'B' as Regelcode ,'100' as TransType ,Getdate() As 'Datum' ,reknr ,'Invalid stock' As oms25 ,'600' As kstplcode ,artcode ,facode ,'95' As warehouse , aantal ,bdr_hfl ,GETDATE() As 'docdate' from [400]..gbkmut g with (nolock) inner Join [400]..items I with (nolock) on i.itemcode = g.artcode where artcode = '0103641' and oms25 like '%PROD00202614.002%' and reknr = ' 3300' and aantal = 19
select '%runid%' as HeaderID, '70' as dagbknr
select 52200927 as headerID, 52200927 as ordernr
select ordernr as HeaderID, id, prijs83, 0 as prijs_n from [483]..orsrg with (NOLOCK) where ordernr = 52200927 and regel in (117)
select distinct a.ordernr as headerID, a.ordernr from ExactData.._ST_Update_DAFPrices_230202 a inner join [%abeitargetdb%]..orkrg o with (NOLOCK) on o.ordernr = a.ordernr

select a.ordernr as HeaderID, a.id, a.prijs83, a.prijs_n from ExactData.._ST_Update_DAFPrices_230202 a inner join [%abeitargetdb%]..orkrg o with (NOLOCK) on o.ordernr = a.ordernr inner join [%abeitargetdb%]..orsrg r with (NOLOCK) on o.ordernr = r.ordernr and r.id = a.id
select top 1 cmp_wwn, cmp_code, 'B' as cmp_status, cmp_type from cicmpy with (NOLOCK) where cmp_type <> 'C' and cmp_status = 'E' order by cmp_code

select gbk.project as headerid,gbk.ID, '32 ' as warehouse, gbk.artcode from gbkmut gbk with (nolock) inner join prproject pr with (nolock) on gbk.project = pr.projectnr inner join items it with (nolock) on gbk.artcode = it.itemcode and gbk.reknr = it.GLAccountDistribution inner join voorrd vrd on it.itemcode = vrd.artcode --inner join magaz m on gbk.warehouse = m.magcode where 1=1 and pr.type = 'p' and transtype = 'B' and gbk.transsubtype = 'A' and gbk.bud_vers = 'MRP' and gbk.blockitem = '0' and gbk.freefield1 = 'P' and gbk.warehouse = '1 ' and vrd.magcode = '32 ' and gbk.project = 'prod00192027'

select gbka.project as headerid,gbkb.ID from gbkmut gbka with (nolock) inner join prproject pr with (nolock) on gbka.project = pr.projectnr inner join items it with (nolock) on gbka.artcode = it.itemcode and gbka.reknr = it.GLAccountDistribution inner join voorrd vrd on it.itemcode = vrd.artcode inner join gbkmut gbkb with (nolock) on gbka.project = gbkb.project inner join items itb with (nolock) on gbkb.artcode = itb.itemcode and gbkb.reknr = itb.GLAccountDistribution --inner join magaz m on gbk.warehouse = m.magcode where 1=1 and pr.type = 'p' and gbka.transtype = 'B' and gbka.transsubtype = 'B' and gbka.bud_vers = 'MRP' and gbka.blockitem = '0' and gbka.freefield1 = 'P' and gbka.warehouse = '1 '
and gbkb.transtype = 'B' and gbkb.transsubtype = 'B' and gbkb.bud_vers = 'MRP' and gbkb.blockitem = '0' and gbkb.freefield1 = 'P' and gbkb.warehouse = '1 ' and gbka.project = gbkb.project and gbkb.project = 'prod00192027' group by gbka.project,gbkb.ID

SELECT top 100 PERCENT a.itemcode, a.Userfield_02 as Old_value, b.Userfield_02 FROM [484]..items a Inner join [ExactData].[dbo].[Import_Item_location] b on a.itemcode = b.itemcode Collate Database_default
step.contentbody:
Hi Jelle,

See below the changes that were made to the items in the 484 database.






itemcodeOld_valueUserfield_02
%itemcode%%Old_value%%Userfield_02%

step.datasource: SELECT top 100 PERCENT a.itemcode, a.Userfield_02 as Old_value, b.Userfield_02 FROM [484]..items a Inner join [ExactData].[dbo].[Import_Item_location] b on a.itemcode = b.itemcode Collate Database_default

select bkstnr as HeaderID ,'A' as TransSubType ,'B' as Regelcode ,'N' as TransType ,'151' as Type -- ,'100' as TransactionType ,GETDATE() As 'Datum' ,i.GLAccountDistribution as Reknr ,'Restore VR stock' as oms25 ,'600' as kstplcode , artcode , facode ,'32' As warehouse ,ISNULL(aantal,1) as aantal ,cast(ISNULL(aantal,1) * i.CostPriceStandard as numeric (18,3)) as bdr_hfl ,GETDATE() As 'docdate' from [exactdata].dbo._st_restore_wh30_stock r with (nolock) inner join [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.items i with (NOLOCK) on r.artcode = i.itemcode collate database_default where facode NOT IN( 'PPB05FA', 'PPB05F8')

select bkstnr as HeaderID ,'B' as TransSubType ,'B' as Regelcode ,'N' as TransType ,'150' as Type -- ,'100' as TransactionType ,GETDATE() As 'Datum' ,i.GLAccountDistribution as Reknr ,'Restore VR stock' as oms25 ,'600' as kstplcode , artcode , facode ,'30' As warehouse ,-ISNULL(aantal,1) as aantal ,cast(-ISNULL(aantal,1) * i.CostPriceStandard as numeric (18,3)) as bdr_hfl ,GETDATE() As 'docdate' from [exactdata].dbo._st_restore_wh30_stock r with (nolock) inner join [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.items i with (NOLOCK) on r.artcode = i.itemcode collate database_default where facode NOT IN ( 'PPB05FA', 'PPB05F8')

select distinct bkstnr as HeaderId , 70 as dagbknr from [exactdata].dbo._st_restore_wh30_stock r with (nolock) inner join [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.items i with (NOLOCK) on r.artcode = i.itemcode collate database_default

DELETE FROM [ExactData].._ST_EG_Import_SORequestedDate_States
-- Filter rows that has been changed INSERT INTO [ExactData].._ST_EG_Import_SORequestedDate_States (Import_id, new_state, new_message, syscreated) SELECT i.ID as Import_id, 10 AS new_state, 'Itemcode or quantity changed' as new_message, GETDATE() as syscreated FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_EG_Import_SORequestedDate] i with (NOLOCK) inner join [400]..orsrg r with (NOLOCK) on r.ordernr = i.ordernr and r.regel = i.RowNr WHERE State = 0 and ( i.Itemcode collate database_default <> r.artcode or i.Quantity <> r.esr_aantal )
UPDATE [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_EG_Import_SORequestedDate] SET [State] = new_state, [Message] = new_Message, Sysmodified = GETDATE(), RunId = '%runid%' FROM [ExactData].._ST_EG_Import_SORequestedDate_States WHERE ID = Import_id
DELETE FROM [ExactData].._ST_EG_Import_SORequestedDate_States
-- Filter rows with the correct date --INSERT INTO [ExactData].._ST_EG_Import_SORequestedDate_States (Import_id, new_state, new_message, syscreated) --SELECT i.ID as Import_id, 11 AS new_state, 'Date already set' as new_message, GETDATE() as syscreated --FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_EG_Import_SORequestedDate] i with (NOLOCK) --INNER JOIN [400]..[orkrg] k WITH (NOLOCK) ON i.OrderNr = k.ordernr and i.DebtorNr collate database_default = k.debnr --INNER JOIN [400]..[orsrg] r WITH (NOLOCK) ON i.OrderNr = r.ordernr and i.RowNr = r.regel --WHERE State = 0 and r.afldat = i.NewRequestedDate
UPDATE [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_EG_Import_SORequestedDate] SET [State] = new_state, [Message] = new_Message, Sysmodified = GETDATE(), RunId = '%runid%' FROM [ExactData].._ST_EG_Import_SORequestedDate_States WHERE ID = Import_id
DELETE FROM [ExactData].._ST_EG_Import_SORequestedDate_States
-- Filter rows already delivered INSERT INTO [ExactData].._ST_EG_Import_SORequestedDate_States (Import_id, new_state, new_message, syscreated) SELECT i.ID as Import_id, 12 AS new_state, 'Already delivered' as new_message, GETDATE() as syscreated FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_EG_Import_SORequestedDate] i with (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [400]..[orkrg] k WITH (NOLOCK) ON i.OrderNr = k.ordernr and i.DebtorNr collate database_default = k.debnr INNER JOIN [400]..[orsrg] r WITH (NOLOCK) ON i.OrderNr = r.ordernr and i.RowNr = r.regel WHERE State = 0 and ( r.aant_gelev > 0 or k.ord_soort <> 'V' or k.afgehandld = 1 or r.pakbon_afg = 1 )
UPDATE [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_EG_Import_SORequestedDate] SET [State] = new_state, [Message] = new_Message, Sysmodified = GETDATE(), RunId = '%runid%' FROM [ExactData].._ST_EG_Import_SORequestedDate_States WHERE ID = Import_id
DELETE FROM [ExactData].._ST_EG_Import_SORequestedDate_States
-- Filter rows in orders with sets INSERT INTO [ExactData].._ST_EG_Import_SORequestedDate_States (Import_id, new_state, new_message, syscreated) SELECT i.ID as Import_id, 1 AS new_state, 'Order contains set items, change manual' as new_message, GETDATE() as syscreated FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_EG_Import_SORequestedDate] i with (NOLOCK) WHERE State = 0 and ordernr in ( SELECT distinct ordernr FROM [400]..orsrg with (NOLOCK) where pakbon_afg = 0 and artcode in ( select distinct itemcode from [400]..ItemRelations with (NOLOCK)))
UPDATE [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_EG_Import_SORequestedDate] SET [State] = new_state, [Message] = new_Message, Sysmodified = GETDATE(), RunId = '%runid%' FROM [ExactData].._ST_EG_Import_SORequestedDate_States WHERE ID = Import_id
DELETE FROM [ExactData].._ST_EG_Import_SORequestedDate_States
-- Update rows to be processed INSERT INTO [ExactData].._ST_EG_Import_SORequestedDate_States (Import_id, new_state, new_message, old_PlannedDate, syscreated) SELECT i.ID as Import_id, 1 AS new_state, '' as new_message, r.PlannedDate, GETDATE() as syscreated FROM [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_EG_Import_SORequestedDate] i with (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [400]..[orkrg] k WITH (NOLOCK) ON i.OrderNr = k.ordernr and i.DebtorNr collate database_default = k.debnr INNER JOIN [400]..[orsrg] r WITH (NOLOCK) ON i.OrderNr = r.ordernr and i.RowNr = r.regel and r.artcode = i.itemcode collate database_default where State = 0
UPDATE [ExactData].[dbo].[_ST_EG_Import_SORequestedDate] SET [State] = new_state, [Message] = new_Message, EGPlannedDate = old_PlannedDate, Sysmodified = GETDATE(), RunId = '%runid%' FROM [ExactData].._ST_EG_Import_SORequestedDate_States WHERE ID = Import_id
DELETE FROM [ExactData].._ST_EG_Import_SORequestedDate_States

step.contentbody:
Hi Monique,


Hierbij een kolom met alle selectioncodes die nu worden geupdate.

Naar verwachting duurt dit tussen de 30 en 90 minuten.






ordernrold_selcodeselcode
%ordernr%%old_selcode%%selcode%
step.stepname: mail old and new selectioncode for orders

step.datasource:
SELECT 1
--SELECT '400 - Orlaco Products' AS DBName , -- SettingGroup collate database_default AS SettingGroup, -- SettingName collate database_default AS SettingName, -- OldValue collate database_default AS OldValue, -- NewValue collate database_default AS NewValue, -- FullName collate database_default AS UserName, -- Created --FROM [400].dbo._AB_VW_SETTINGS WHERE DATEDIFF(d, created, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= 7 --AND OldValue <> NewValue
--UNION --SELECT '483 - Orlaco GmbH' AS DBName , -- SettingGroup collate database_default AS SettingGroup, -- SettingName collate database_default AS SettingName, -- OldValue collate database_default AS OldValue, -- NewValue collate database_default AS NewValue, -- FullName collate database_default AS UserName, -- Created --FROM [483].dbo._AB_VW_SETTINGS WHERE DATEDIFF(d, created, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= 7
--UNION --SELECT '484 - Orlaco Inc' AS DBName , -- SettingGroup collate database_default AS SettingGroup, -- SettingName collate database_default AS SettingName, -- OldValue collate database_default AS OldValue, -- NewValue collate database_default AS NewValue, -- FullName collate database_default AS UserName, -- Created --FROM [484].dbo._AB_VW_SETTINGS WHERE DATEDIFF(d, created, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= 7
--UNION --SELECT 'Synergy' AS DBName , -- SettingGroup collate database_default AS SettingGroup, -- SettingName collate database_default AS SettingName, -- OldValue collate database_default AS OldValue, -- NewValue collate database_default AS NewValue, -- FullName collate database_default AS UserName, -- Created --FROM [orlaco].dbo._AB_VW_SETTINGS WHERE DATEDIFF(d, created, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= 7
--ORDER BY DBName, created
step.contentbody:
Hi,

This are the Exact configuration changes of last week.

This email is automaticly created by ABEI on  %abeinow%
step.settings: uniquekey=;retryunique=0;ssrsserver=;ssrsreport=;ssrsformat=HTML4.0;ssrsfile=;emailfrom=abei@orlaco.com;emailname=ABEI @ EWS01;emailreplyto=lennart.meeuse@stoneridge.com;emailuser=;emailpwd=TFEEY7QNB86Yzc1ll50jtg%equalchar%%equalchar%;emailserver=smtpinternal.stoneridge.com;emailport=25;emailssl=False;emailto=lennart.meeuse@stoneridge.com;emailcc=;emailbcc=;emailsub=TEST MC-4 Log report of Exact configuration changes;emailbodyusesource=-1;emailsendifnoresults=-1;emailcontentcolumns=;mex_connectionid=0;
step.stepname: Update ProductionOrder to include Missing Quantity

step.datasource:
SELECT TOP 100 PERCENT
o.id, o.Ordernr as HeaderId, CAST(o.Regel AS int) as Regel, o.Artcode, o.oms45 as Omschrijving, RD.New_RequestedDate as Requesteddate
FROM [ExactData].._ST_EG_Import_RequestedDate RD WITH (NOLOCK)
INNER JOIN [100]..orsrg o WITH (NOLOCK) ON RD.Ordernr COLLATE database_default = o.ordernr AND rd.regel COLLATE database_default = o.regel AND rd.artcode COLLATE database_default = o.artcode INNER JOIN [100]..humres ha WITH (NOLOCK) ON o.syscreator = ha.res_id INNER JOIN [100]..humres hm WITH (NOLOCK) ON o.sysmodifier = hm.res_id
WHERE rd.Status = 1
